parameters: It seems to react when I try to pass, and
No one that I know has ever been where we are
Elim, is the stone doing anything?
There's no one else here...is there?
It's been a long time since anyone was able to come to this
place. But your arrival also heralds the beginning of a
Doom? You mean Sargon don't you?
Sargon...yes that was his name. He is indeed a great threat
to you. But not the greatest that you will face. At least,
You speak in riddles stranger, who are you?
And of what threat do you speak?
I have the shard...who are you?
Who am I? It has been many years since I even thought about
my name. I have been in this place for quite some time,
waiting for the time when evil once again rose up to
cover the world in darkness. I was once known as the Oracle.
The Oracle? I don't think i've ever heard of
an Oracle in all the histories of the Kingdom.
No one has been in here in my lifetime Odan -
Your friend speaks the truth. It has been centuries since I
was last called upon for aid. But I have existed longer
still. I have watched over the world, keeping a distant eye
on events. We are approaching a pivotal moment in time.
You seem to know why we are here, even though
we do not. I am not so arrogant as to presume
I know what is going on here. Please, will you
share what you know? All we know is that the
Dread Warlord Sargon seems to be back in play
after centuries of being dead. One of his
servants tried to obtain this shard from the
The shard you hold, is a powerful artifact indeed. But it
is only a fragment of the true power Sargon seeks. It comes
The Sword has existed for centuries. It is a
loathsome weapon, powered by anguish and suffering.
What does that have to do with the Shard we
The sword is capable of consuming the souls of the living.
When it does, it's power and magic grow stronger. But as
with all things, life finds balance. As souls were
consumed, these Shards appeared in the world, offering power
to oppose its evil. Each shard contains the aspect of a
captured soul, working in its own way to oppose its captor.
Wait, I don't understand. If Sargon has this
sword, why does he also need the shards?
The core of the problem. Sargon is not the wielder of the
sword - but he is its last victim. You saw a glimpse of
these events in your vision in the catacombs Elim.
If Sargon's soul was consumed by the sword,
how are his servants acting on his behalf
That is where my knowledge ends... Whatever plan he has
orchestrated to act from beyond the grave is beyond my
Why didn't Sargon use this sword to conquer
the Kingdom back in the great conflict?
The sword was unknown to him. When it claimed him, he was
So if agents of Sargon acquire enough of these
shards, they will be able to free him from it?
I do not know - the shards merely give the power to stand
against the sword in battle. Given that sargon is already
captured, I do not see how they can be used to free him. But
if his servants are trying to get them, you must do all in
your power to put a stop to their plans. My sight is not
perfect - I do not know how many shards they may hold
How do we use these shards?
Shards are special - they are often attuned to the user.
You will find when you hold them, new powers will flow
through you. Some shards are better suited to different
users, and may offer more powers.
What about this shard, does it hold any power?
Yes, this one appears to contain the aspect of a mighty
And the sword - do you know where it might be?
The heart of evil - Shadowfell Spire.
Elim how will we even get there? It's said to
You must not go there now - you must gather your strength,
and acquire enough shards to overpower the sword. If one
of Sargon's servants is wielding it, their power would be
formidable indeed. The sword will grant great power to its
master, so long as they have the strength to resist being
I wish I could offer gladder tidings in this dark moment.
I can however, offer some last assistance. There is another
shard that can be obtained in this tower.
Take the other door out of this room. The tower is not as
it seems - you will need your wits about you in order to
Can we help you escape from this place?
There is no need, for I am a willing vanguard. I wish you

parameters.newDescription:
1) Return to Willowbend either via the Dauntless
 at Altair Docks, or through
 Stinger Swamp, and travel to the
 tower north of the town.
2) Enter the tower.
3) Explore the Tower
4) Obtain the Shard in the Tower
